title: Innovation Cloud - Privacy Policy
content:
Privacy Policy
Privacy Policy
Innovation Cloud Privacy Policy
Last updated on June 19, 2018
Innovation Cloud SARL, Rue de l’industrie 15, L-8069 Bertrange, Luxembourg (the “Company” or “We”, “Our”, “Us”) is committed to protecting the privacy of individuals (“Clients” or “You”, “Your”) who register to use the Company’s Web site at www.innovationcloud.com and its subscribed services as defined below. This Privacy Policy governs Company’s privacy practices in relation to the use of the Company’s Website and the related applications and services offered by the Company. This policy also governs how we handle the information regarding data collection, processing and usage practices when you visit and use Innovation Cloud services. It also describes your choices regarding use, access and correction of your personal information. By using our Website and our services, you understand and consent to the collection, storage and processing of your information. If you do not agree with the data practices described in this Privacy Policy, you should not use the Website or the Services.
Policy is important so please read it carefully.
USE OF WEBSITE AND THE SUBSCRIPTION SERVICES
Our online applications and services allow any company to manage innovation management process. The information provided to the applications and services, either by website visitors or when service users submit the information, is stored and managed on our service providers’ servers. This information is then used to contact visitors and users, about their interest in the Company’s services and interact with them. We process our clients’ information as they direct and in accordance with our agreements with our customers, and we store it on our service providers’ servers, but we do not have control over its collection or management. Our agreements with our clients prohibit us from using that information, except as necessary to provide and improve the Subscription Service, as permitted by this Privacy Policy, and as required by law. We acknowledge that clients have rights to access their Personal information.
INFORMATION WE COLLECT
When you visit our Website
You are free to explore Company’s Website without providing any Personal Information about yourself. We collect Navigation Information.
The Company’s Web site may contain links to other web sites. The information practices or the content of other web sites is governed by the privacy policy of such other web sites.
Our Website includes Widgets, such as the Share This button that run on our sites. This feature may collect your IP address, which page you are visiting on our sites, and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly. The Widgets are hosted by a third party. This Privacy Policy does not apply to this feature. Your interactions with this feature are governed by the Privacy Policy and other policies of the companies providing them.
When you register to our Subscription Services
When registering to use the Company’s Services, We ask you to voluntarily provide Us with personal information, such as Your name, address, email address, tax ID or similar information about your business and we collect Navigation Information. If You sign-up for a 30-day free trial account, you are not required to enter your credit card information unless and until you decide to continue with a paid subscription to the Service. We accept credit card, PayPal and bank transfer payment. Company uses a third-party intermediary to manage credit card processing. This intermediary is not permitted to store, retain, or use your billing information for any purpose except for credit card processing on Company’s behalf.
"Personal Information"
”Personal information” refers to any information that you voluntarily submit to us and that identifies you personally, including contact information, such as your name, e-mail address, company name, address, phone number, and other information about yourself or your business. Personal Information can also include information about any transactions, both free and paid, that you enter on our Website for Subscription services, and information about you that is publicly available on the internet, such as from Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter and Google.
Personal Information also includes Navigational Information or Payment Information where such information can directly or indirectly identify an individual. Navigational information refers to information about your computer and your visits to this website such as your IP address, geographical location, browser type, referral source, length of visit and pages viewed. Payment information refers to payment information from you when you subscribe to the Subscription Service, including credit cards numbers and billing information, using third party intermediary service providers.
Use of personal information
We use the information we collect only in compliance with this Privacy Policy. Clients who subscribe to our Services are obligated through our agreements with them to comply with this Privacy Policy. The Company uses data about Clients to perform the services requested, to respond to clients support requests and to improve the Company’s Services.
We post clients testimonials and comments on our Websites, which may contain Personal Information. We obtain each client’s consent via email prior to posting the client’s name and testimonial.
We may also use data about Clients for marketing purposes. For example, the Company may use the information you provide to send you information regarding the Company and its services, as well as regarding changes in legal agreements.
The Company may share data about Clients with the Company’s contracted service providers so that these service providers can provide services on our behalf and with other companies in order to work with them, including affiliates of the Company.
The Company reserves the right to use or disclose information provided if required by law or if the Company reasonably believes that use or disclosure is necessary to protect the Company’s rights and/or to comply with a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process.
Retention of personal information
We retain Personal information that our clients provide to us where we have an ongoing legitimate business need to do so (for example, as long as required in order to contact clients about the Services, or as needed to comply with our legal obligations, resolve issues and enforce our agreements). When We have no ongoing legitimate business need to process your Personal information, We will securely delete the information or isolate it from any further processing until deletion is possible. We will delete your information from the servers at an earlier date if you so request, as in "To Unsubscribe from Our Communications" channels. You may unsubscribe from our marketing communications channels by clicking on the "unsubscribe" link located on the bottom of our e-mails, updating your communication preferences, or by sending us email at office@innovationcloud.com.
We may transfer personal information around the world, to and from countries in which the Company has operations.
Security of your personal information
The Company uses a variety of appropriate, security technologies and procedures to protect client personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. All personal information is protected using appropriate physical, technical and organizational measures to protect data about Clients at all times.
We do not share or sell personal information collected from the Company’s Web site with any third parties, except as provided in this Privacy Policy.
COOKIES
We may also collect information through the use of information gathering tools, such as cookies. Such information includes standard information from your web browser (such as browser type and browser language), your Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, and the actions you take on the Company’s Web site (such as the web pages viewed). That information is used by Company for the operation of the Service, to maintain the quality of the Service, and to provide general statistics regarding use of the Company’s Website.
The Company uses cookies to make interactions with the Company’s Web site easier. When you visit the Company’s Web site, the Company’s servers send a cookie to your computer. Cookies as such do not personally identify you but merely recognize your web browser. Unless you choose to identify yourself to the Company by subscribing to a specific service you remain anonymous to the Company. The Company uses 3 types of cookies:

Necessary – website and services cannot function properly without these cookies;
Preference and statistics – allows website to remember information that changes (e.g. preferred language) and help us to understand how visitors interacts with website and services;
Marketing and analytics – these cookies are used to understand how visitors use our website and to customize our website for better user experience and to make advertising messages more relevant to the visitors.

 
If you disable your web browser’s ability to accept cookies, you will be able to navigate the Company’s Web site, but you will not be able to successfully use the services.
HOW TO ACCESS & CONTROL YOUR PERSONAL DATA
You have the following data protection rights:

You can request access, correction, updates or deletion of your personal information.
You can object to processing of your personal information, ask us to restrict processing of your personal information or request portability of your personal information.
If we have collected and process your personal information with your consent, then you can withdraw your consent at any time.
You have the right to complain to a data protection authority about our collection and use of your personal information.

You may update, change or delete your Personal information at any time by editing your user profile online. You may also request that Your personal information is not processed in which case You will not be able to use Our Services. If client request to remove data, we will respond within a reasonable timeframe. We may work with our clients to help them provide notice to their visitors about their data collection, processing and usage.
If you decide to withdraw your consent, you can do that at any time. Withdrawing your consent will not affect the lawfulness of any processing we conducted prior to your withdrawal, nor will it affect processing of your personal information conducted in reliance on lawful processing grounds other than consent.
You may direct any inquiries or complaints related to our Privacy Policy compliance to office@innovationcloud.com. If you have an unresolved privacy or data use concern that we have not addressed satisfactorily, you can request the supervisory authority to investigate the issue and will let you know about the progress of the investigation and its outcome within a reasonable period of time.
In the case of a personal data breach, we will without undue delay and, if it is possible, not later than 72 hours after having become aware of it, notify the personal data breach to the supervisory authority. If the notification to the supervisory authority is not made within 72 hours, we have to explain the reasons for the delay. We document any personal data breaches, comprising the facts relating to the personal data breach, its effects and the remedial action taken.
Clients may contact the data protection officer with regard to all issues related to the processing of their personal data at office@innovationcloud.com
 
The Company reserves the right to change this Privacy Policy. We will provide notification of the changes to this Privacy Policy through the Company’s Website prior to the change taking effect.
Questions regarding this Privacy Policy should be directed to the Company’s Privacy Officer by e-mailing office@innovationcloud.com

Policy is important so please read it carefully.

Our agreements with our clients prohibit us from using that information, except as necessary to provide and improve the Subscription Service, as permitted by this Privacy Policy, and as required by law. We acknowledge that clients have rights to access their Personal information.

When you visit our Website

The Company’s Web site may contain links to other web sites. The information practices or the content of other web sites is governed by the privacy policy of such other web sites.
Our Website includes Widgets, such as the Share This button that run on our sites. This Privacy Policy does not apply to this feature. Your interactions with this feature are governed by the Privacy Policy and other policies of the companies providing them.
When you register to our Subscription Services

This intermediary is not permitted to store, retain, or use your billing information for any purpose except for credit card processing on Company’s behalf.

Personal Information can also include information about any transactions, both free and paid, that you enter on our Website for Subscription services, and information about you that is publicly available on the internet, such as from Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter and Google.
Personal Information also includes Navigational Information or Payment Information where such information can directly or indirectly identify an individual. Navigational information refers to information about your computer and your visits to this website such as your IP address, geographical location, browser type, referral source, length of visit and pages viewed. Payment information refers to payment information from you when you subscribe to the Subscription Service, including credit cards numbers and billing information, using third party intermediary service providers.

We post clients testimonials and comments on our Websites, which may contain Personal Information. We obtain each client’s consent via email prior to posting the client’s name and testimonial.

title: FAQ
content:
FAQ
				Frequently Asked Questions and Answers
FAQ
				Frequently Asked Questions and Answers
What solutions Innovation Cloud has to offer? 
							
						
						
							
								Innovation Cloud offers four different solutions ready to guide you through ideation and innovation processes. While Innovation Cloud Startup and PRO are idea management software, Innovation Cloud Enterprise and Global are end-to-end innovation management platforms.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 How long can I use Innovation Cloud Startup for free? 
							
						
						
							
								Innovation Cloud Startup is forever free solution for the users who prove that they are registered as startups during the period of the first month of using Innovation Cloud Startup.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 Can I use Innovation Cloud on my smartphone? 
							
						
						
							
								Innovation Cloud supports all devices and screen sizes, with its built-in responsive design.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 What are the differences between Innovation Cloud Startup and PRO? 
							
						
						
							
								The main difference between Innovation Cloud Startup and PRO is the list of features provided. While Innovation Cloud Startup has set of basic features for successfully managing ideation, Innovation Cloud PRO software has more comprehensive list of features, covering scoring mechanisms, campaign workflow and advanced analytics and reports.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 Can I downgrade my Innovation Cloud account? 
							
						
						
							
								No. Due to the limitations of each package regarding the number of the users, ideas and storage, it is not possible to migrate data from higher to lower packages. However, you can terminate your account and open a new one at any time.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 What happens after 30 days free trial of Innovation Cloud PRO? 
							
						
						
							
								Once you sign up for one of our Innovation Cloud PRO packages, we offer you 30 days free trial period! Before this period is over you will be informed in a timely manner in order to complete subscription for desired PRO account.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 What will happen if I cancel my Pro subscription in the middle of already charged quarter or a year? 
							
						
						
							
								Your PRO account will remain active until next payment cycle. At that point it will be canceled with no further charges.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 If my subscription expires, what will happen to my data? 
							
						
						
							
								After subscription expires for Innovation Cloud PRO users, we will keep your data accessible for next 7 days. During this period, you can renew your subscription and continue where you left off. After this period, we will archive your data for the next 30 days, in case that you want to use your account again. After this period your data will be deleted for security and privacy reasons. NOTE: You can close your account and delete all your data at any time by yourself.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 How can I activate my Innovation Cloud account? 
							
						
						
							
								To successfully activate your Innovation Cloud Startup or PRO account, please follow the activation link sent to your email upon requesting Startup or PRO account, choose a strong password and click on Submit button.
							
						
					
																																
						
							
								 Is my data safe with Innovation Cloud? 
							
						
						
							
								Yes, your data is safe on our servers. With over 80 servers located in world’s top datacenters we make sure to provide best service to all of our clients. We regard innovations and ideas as essential assets of your business and security of your data is our top priority. The Innovation Cloud infrastructure is extremely strong and secure with multi-level defenses, disaster recovery options and intelligent data encryption. In addition to the security provided through the Innovation Cloud environment and our own operational policies, there are many additional protective capabilities built into the application itself. Those capabilities include:

Single sign-on (SSO)
Two-factor authentication (2FA)
Sophisticated user permissions
Features and ideas export
Anti-virus scanning
IP address access control
Account backup and export

All this makes it possible to safely access and develop your ideas, anytime.
							
						
					
										
						
				
			
				

																									
						
							
								 Who can use Innovation Cloud Startup? 
							
						
						
							
								Innovation Cloud Startup is developed to support idea management for early stage companies - startups. Everybody can create Innovation Cloud Startup account, but only companies that provide evidence that they are a startup company within the first month of usage can continue to use it for free. To prove that you are startup company, please send us your legal documentation (proof of registration) or link with your crowdfunding campaign and continue using it for free.
							
						
					
																																	
						
							
								 Is the Innovation Cloud available on Windows, Mac and Linux? 
							
						
						
							
								Yes. Innovation Cloud is an online platform compatible with each of popular Operating Systems. All you need is your favorite Internet browser and an Internet connection.
							
						
					
																																	
						
							
								 Does Innovation Cloud have mobile apps? 
							
						
						
							
								Yes, Innovation Cloud has mobile apps for Android and iOS phone. Find it in your application store!
							
						
					
																																	
						
							
								 How can I upgrade my Innovation Cloud account? 
							
						
						
							
								To upgrade your Innovation Cloud account, first login to your existing account. Once you are there, choose the Upgrade & Payment option from the drop-down menu in the upper right corner. Select new package and period of usage, then confirm your payment details. You can also find an upgrade button on your administration settings panel.
							
						
					
																																	
						
							
								 Do you charge Innovation Cloud PRO per user? 
							
						
						
							
								No. We charge for the overall service provided within different packages.
							
						
					
																																	
						
							
								 Can I cancel my subscription at any time? 
							
						
						
							
								Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Go to Upgrade & Payment option located in the user drop-down menu at the very top right corner of your Innovation Cloud account and select Cancel Subscription.
							
						
					
																																	
						
							
								 What kind of payment do you accept? 
							
						
						
							
								Payment options available for purchasing Innovation Cloud PRO accounts are: all major Credit cards, bank transfer/Invoice and PayPal.
							
						
					
																																	
						
							
								 How do I reset my password? 
							
						
						
							
								To reset your password, please go to login page and click I cannot access my account link. This option will trigger new form where you need to provide your email address in order to get instructions how to reset your password.
							
						
					
																																	
						
							
								 Where can I get support for the Innovation Cloud? 
							
						
						
							
								We have a dedicated team of experts available 24/7, helping you utilize our software solutions to the best of your capabilities.For Innovation Cloud Startup and PRO accounts, you can find answers and support on our help page. For Enterprise users, we offer full customer support services via phone and email. If you have any questions, please contact us on support@innovationcloud.com.
